# ActivityPreviewViewKind.DynamicIslandPreviewViewState.compact

**Case**

The presentation of a Live Activity in the Dynamic Island that shows both the [doc://com.apple.WidgetKit/documentation/WidgetKit/DynamicIslandMode/compactLeading] and [doc://com.apple.WidgetKit/documentation/WidgetKit/DynamicIslandMode/compactTrailing] views combined.

## Declaration

```swift
case compact
```

## Dynamic Island presentations

- **ActivityPreviewViewKind.DynamicIslandPreviewViewState.minimal**: The minimal presentation of a Live Activity in the Dynamic Island.
- **ActivityPreviewViewKind.DynamicIslandPreviewViewState.expanded**: The expanded presentation of a Live Activity in the Dynamic Island.
